thread.title: Arthur Chancellor

author: Arthur Chancellor
title: Arthur Chancellor
text: OK, I started the program after trying others- it does take some discipline but to keep with the program and eating the food. Hardest thing for me is keeping a schedule because of my job- have discovered you can add things to spice the food up and I al really not hungary- and I like vegetables so I have plenty and it works- first week 12 pounds, first month 26 pounds.
